name: Keep It Safe 2
description: Keep It Safe is a game, where the players take control of a vehicle, racing through a hilly terrain, so that they can transport various cargo to the market
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 25 MB available space
